TODO - Single Page App

June 2015

See it on Codepen

Design, HTML, CSS, jQuery

Challenge

Demonstrate a simple dynamic single page application using jQuery. Items entered into the text field should be appended to the task list without page reload.

This site is designed and hand-coded by myself, using a custom responsive grid, HTML5 validated, CSS validated, optimized for accessibility, with minimal JavaScript enhancements. It's powered by github.io with Jekyll blog integration.
